name: Savory Italian Sausage Sauce
author: Carliey
summary: This is a great homemade sauce. It's savory and spicy, as well as thick and chunky. The secret is the combination of Italian sausage, green onions, red wine and red pepper flakes. Easily double or triple amount and top on anything! Even better the next day. Enjoy.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add sausage and cook for 4 minutes, breaking apart with a spoon
Add green onions and cook until sausage is evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, basil and oregano; cook for 5 minutes
Stir in tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, and tomato paste
Add water, red wine, red pepper flakes, and sugar
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 1 hour
